summary: I'm a full-stack developer and I enjoy working in all areas of a codebase. I'm passionate about creating seamless UI/UX experiences that lead to acquiring and retaining users, creating new features using React/Javascript, Typescript and Scss. Not to mention, creating succinct and well-documented APIs that interface with third party integrations like Stripe and ShipEngine.

positions.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
positions.description: As a flexible engineer on a small team, I was able to interact with nearly every part of a large software application with which customers can create and publish their own websites. Among the many projects I worked on during my time at Universe, I created new api's for shipping integration and payment management. I was involved from the ground up on creating a new web platform to match the company's iOS app. Within this, I created UI flows for site management, merchant sign up, commerce and order management, new page publication, and subscription upsells, among many more projects.

positions.title: Front-end Software Engineer
positions.description: As the front-end developer of a small team, I worked closely with project managers and designers to code client web applications to spec using Angular. The projects worked on include a web application for a healthcare device company, utilizing smart device connections to record usage data and metrics, as well as white-label application for an insurance conglomerate.

positions.title: Front-end Software Engineer
positions.description: I worked on multiple projects in an Agile environment using Jira and Microsoft tooling, focusing on React front end, working with a Graphql API. These projects included metrics dashboards, internal communication tools, and internal component libraries.

positions.title: Front-end Software Developer Intern
positions.description: In the short four months I interned with Groundfloor, I designed and coded an experimental react native app to match the company's web app. I met with product owners regularly to receive feedback and share updates. I also contributed to a Vue.js UI dashboard project.
